alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 14 at 2:49AM CST until February 14 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS THE WINTER GARDEN..THE SOUTHERN EDWARDS PLATEAU...AND PORTIONS OF THE HILL COUNTRY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR GILLESPIE AND LLANO COUNTIES... The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 7 PM CST this evening. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any wildfires that develop could be difficult to control and will likely spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
